title: The Lady in the Coat
description: Why does she scare you so, The Lady in the Coat?  Isaac is having a night out with some of his work mates and sees The Lady in the Coat kidnap a man from the table next to his. All of his mates tell him that he was drunk and had imagined it. A short while after this incident, Isaac runs into high flying accountant, Axton Thatcher. They both admit they have had near-death/terrifying experiences with The Lady in the Coat. After sharing their terrifying stories, they make the brave but necessary decision to follow The Lady in the Coat. Who will win?
author: AL Boyde
